Name: Progressive Web Apps for Beginners
Description: Learn the basics of Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) and how they provide an enhanced user experience by combining web and mobile app features. Suitable for beginners.

Name: Learn PWA
Description: Web.dev by Google provides a comprehensive guide to learning Progressive Web Apps (PWAs). Explore various aspects of PWAs, from getting started to advanced topics.

Name: MDN Web Docs: Progressive Web Apps
Description: Mozilla Developer Network (MDN) offers extensive documentation on Progressive Web Apps (PWAs). Dive deep into PWA concepts, development, and best practices.

Name: Build a Progressive Web App
Description: Watch a video tutorial on building a Progressive Web App (PWA). Follow along to create your PWA and understand the steps involved in the development process.
